EmailTemplate.name: Upcoming Salesforce Changes csi 21
EmailTemplate.subject: IMPORTANT PLEASE READ: New Feature Updates
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
This week's release contains a change to our paperwork process and tour booking features.
Resend Paperwork You can now resend a contract from Salesforce. On the opportunity, you will find a button "Resend Paperwork" in the upper right corner.
This feature is only available when the opportunity stage is "Closing" and the Contract stage is "Contract Voided
New Referral Information fields the on Tour Outcome and Manage/ Book a tour features We've Added 2 new fields “Referrer Name” and “Referrer Email” on the pages for Tour Booking and Tour Outcome to capture the Referrer data. This information is not required.
If you have any questions or concerns, please contact us at salesforcesupport@wework.com
Sincerely Tykira
